verbose_text: In summary, inoculation of Photobacterium MELD1 enhanced the growth of V. unguiculata var. sesquipedalis in Hg contaminated soil, increased the total Hg uptake in roots but significantly decreased Hg concentration in pods.
evidence: MELD1 enhanced the growth of V. unguiculata var. sesquipedalis in Hg contaminated soil, increased the total Hg uptake in roots but significantly decreased Hg
